Errr... I thought we crashed the CF where I have it on the map. And I 
know you can't see Meg's base, but I was kinda too lazy to find a map 
with the arctics on it. However, if you get drunk enough, the map 
should extend itself and you'll be able to see Meg's base.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (Good job Yanshosh, but the Cybertronian Fire is in South Africa, 
which is a 
> country in Africa, not Ethiopia where you have it.  South Africa is 
the very 
> bottom of Africa.  And ya can't see Megatron's base.  It's a good 
step though)
